title: 【高额悬赏】开服出现错误
author: Coobay
txt_content:
atal error: Allowed memory size of 536870912 bytes exhausted (tried to allocate 23 bytes) in /root/11/src/utils/Spyc.php on line 473
10:50:55 [ERROR] An Unrecovereable has ocurred and the server has Crashed. Creating an Error Dump
start.sh: line 14: 45821 段错误              
 (core dumped) ./bin/php -d enable_dl=On PocketMine-MP.php $@
怎么回事？我还有，是不是pm的内存占用太高了？刚开服才30m，现在直彪300多，怎么降低啊？求助

replies.author: Coobay
replies.txt_content: 我用的是linux系统的服务器
